column5: This one of a kind 1100 sqft townhouse 2 bedroom that is located in a hidden gem center of Dallas. Indulge yourself with entertainment inside and out. Amazingly bright modern barn and beach house feel. The design was inspired by a beach house off Malibu. Not to mention the bamboo garden retreat, patio with fire pit, tranquil hot tub. Many surprises await!   NOTE: We only are allowing single families as our HOA rules are restricted. However traveling friends with a family is accepted.
column8: STUNNING California inspired modern beach townhome
